body_html: binarization can be done with tf.sign(). though the tricky part is to get the gradient backprop to work after binarizing input. for now this requires a separate op I implemented in tensorflow. https://github.com/zhengwy888/binary_ops. with this code you can implement your own XNOR net on GPU. comments/suggestions welcome.

body: binarization can be done with tf.sign(). though the tricky part is to get the gradient backprop to work after binarizing input. for now this requires a separate op I implemented in tensorflow. https://github.com/zhengwy888/binary_ops. with this code you can implement your own XNOR net on GPU. comments/suggestions welcome.
